PipelineName.markdownDescription:
The name of the Pipeline.

---

Required: No

Type: string  
Minimum Length: 1  

Maximum Length: 256  

Pattern: ^[a-zA-Z0-9](-*[a-zA-Z0-9])*  

Update requires: No interruption

PipelineDisplayName.description: The display name of the Pipeline.
PipelineDisplayName.markdownDescription:
The display name of the Pipeline.

---

Required: No

Type: string  
Minimum Length: 1  

Maximum Length: 256  

Pattern: ^[a-zA-Z0-9](-*[a-zA-Z0-9])*  

Update requires: No interruption

PipelineDescription.markdownDescription:
The description of the Pipeline.

---

Required: No

Type: string   

Maximum Length: 3072   

Update requires: No interruption

PipelineDefinitionBody.description: A specification that defines the pipeline in JSON format.

PipelineDefinition.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No

Type: object     

Update requires: No interruption

RoleArn.markdownDescription:
Role Arn

---

Required: No

Type: string  
Minimum Length: 20  

Maximum Length: 2048  

Pattern: ^arn:aws[a-z\-]*:iam::\d{12}:role/?[a-zA-Z_0-9+=,.@\-_/]+$  

Update requires: No interruption

Tags.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No

Type: array     

Update requires: No interruption

ParallelismConfiguration.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No

Type: object     

Update requires: No interruption

Bucket.description: The name of the S3 bucket where the PipelineDefinition file is stored.

Key.description: The file name of the PipelineDefinition file (Amazon S3 object name).

Version.description: For versioning-enabled buckets, a specific version of the PipelineDefinition file.

ETag.description: The Amazon S3 ETag (a file checksum) of the PipelineDefinition file. If you don't specify a value, SageMaker skips ETag validation of your PipelineDefinition file.
